features.name: Rapid Development
features.description: Kickstart your hackathon project with our template, built for rapid development. Get your idea off the ground quickly and efficiently.

features.name: User Authentication
features.description: Implement secure user authentication with Supabase Auth. Ensure that only registered participants can access and contribute to the hackathon projects.

features.name: Data Storage with Supabase
features.description: Utilize Supabase Storage for efficient data storage. Store project details, resources, and other relevant information with ease.

features.name: Simple Todo Feature
features.description: Stay organized and boost productivity with our built-in Simple Todo feature. Participants can manage their tasks and stay on top of project goals throughout the hackathon.

features.name: Modular Architecture
features.description: Supaflow follows a modular architecture, making it easy to integrate new features and adapt to the evolving needs of your hackathon project.

features.name: Sleek Styling with Shadcn-vue
features.description: Enhance the visual appeal of your project with the modern styling of Shadcn-vue. Impress participants with a polished and professional interface.

features.name: Responsive Design
features.description: Ensure that participants can access and interact with the project seamlessly on various devices. A responsive design guarantees a smooth user experience for everyone.

features.name: Performance Optimization
features.description: Benefit from the performance and efficiency of Nuxt 3. Deliver project details and updates quickly, keeping participants engaged throughout the hackathon.
